alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo County through 400 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Relampago, or over Progreso, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pharr, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Mercedes, Elsa, Progreso, Edcouch and La Villa. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 1 and 3. US Highway 281 between mile markers 784 and 786, and between mile markers 798 and 812. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
